oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā al-kitāb fī ṣifat al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, sammaytuhu Afḍal al-zād li-yawm al-maʻād fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-ʻibād / jamʻ kātibihi Muḥammad al-ʻAjlūnī : manuscript, 1837
Afḍal al-zād li-yawm al-maʻād fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-ʻibād
Hādhihi Qaṣīdat Sayyidinā Muḥammad
Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAjlūnī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Fatḥ , -1872
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ʻAjlūnī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Fatḥ.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1- al-Durrah al-zāhirah bi-taḍmīn al-Burʼah al-fājirah / lil-Shaykh Qāsim (printed text, paginated 1-15; ff. 1r-8r) -- 2. Afḍal al-zād li-yawm al-maʻād fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-ʻibād (ff. 9r-28v) -- 3. On miracles of the Prophet (ff. 29r-32r) -- 4. Commentary on a verse from the Qurʼān (ff. 32v-34v) -- 5. Hādhihi Qaṣīdat Sayyidinā Muḥammad [A poem in praise of the Prophet] (f. 35r) -- 6. Hādhā Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, 25 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1274 AH [November 12, 1857 AD] (ff. 36r-40v).
Holograph copy, completed on 5 Shaʻbān 1253 AH [November 4, 1837 AD] according to colophon (f. 28v).
The mss is later owned by the author's son Aḥmad Abū al-Fatḥ al-ʻAjlūnī. Ownership statement, dated Rabīʻ al-Awwal, [12]87 AH [1870]. Seal reads Aḥmad Abū al-Fatḥ, 1280 AH [1863/4 AD] (f. 1r).
Written in one column, 20 lines per page, in black and red. Catchwords and comments in the margins.
MS Arab SM7087. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: افضل الزاد ليوم المعاد في الصلاة والسلام على خير العباد
هذا الكتاب في صفة الصلاة على النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم سميته افضل الزاد ليوم المعاد في الصلاة والسلام على خير العباد / جمع كاتبه محمد العجلوني : مخطوطة، 1837
